variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Provides information re submission of data to the NIH GWAS data repository (dbGaP).
variable.comment: For USC subjects entering the study using an informed consent prior to the 9/20/2000 version, the use must be restricted to studies involving cancer as the informed consent documents discussed only cancer. For USC subjects signing an informed consent dated 9/20/2000 or later, data may be used to study any chronic disease. For HI subjects, consent status allows Health Research and Methods.
variable.value: Cancer Research and Cancer Research Methods (CRCRM)
